Toll Free Phone: Please call Enquiry BC at 1.800.663.7867 (7:30am - 5:00pm, and your call will be directed to the Kamloops Fire Centre)Report a Wildfire: 1.800.663.5555 or *5555 from a cell phone to report fires, smoke columns and violations of wildfire regulationsFire Information: 1.888.336.7378 (1.888.3FOREST)  Burn Registration Line:  1.888.797.1717
Primary Contact: Max Birkner, Fire Information Officer; Phone: 250.554.5964 * 250.318.6959
Service Details: - Manages wildfires on both Crown and private lands outside of organized areas such as municipalities or regional districts- Protects life and assets, particularly forests and grasslands, but gives high priority to fires in interface areas where communities and forests come together
